<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Monk Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=715) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 227 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Monk](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=8)

**Prerequisites**
Strength 14; Dexterity 14

</column>

---

You become trained in unarmed attacks and gain the powerful fist class feature. You become trained in your choice of [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); if you are already trained in both of these skills, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You become trained in monk class DC.

**Special** You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the monk archetype.

<title level="2">Monk Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Kata](/Feats.aspx?ID=716), [Monk Moves](/Feats.aspx?ID=719), [Monk Resiliency](/Feats.aspx?ID=717), [Monk's Flurry](/Feats.aspx?ID=720), [Perfection's Path](/Feats.aspx?ID=721)
